mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, password, mobile, email, insert_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, mobile, email, insert_time, update_time from user
